title: ConnectionError: Failed to connect to magicbricks.com
details:

Error Message: Failed to connect to magicbricks.com
Error Args: ('Failed to connect to magicbricks.com',)
suggestion: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support.

title: ValueError: Element not found: div.property-card
details:
Error Type: ValueError
Error Message: Element not found: div.property-card
Error Args: ('Element not found: div.property-card',)
suggestion: The website structure may have changed. This is usually temporary - try again later.

title: TypeError: Invalid city parameter: must be string
